item.title: Getting Started with Hugo & Github Pages
item.description: Big Idea The goal of this post is to capture the steps required to get started with Hugo and Github pages. Hugo is a GO based static site generation tool. Github pages is a feature of Github that allows anyone with a GitHub account host a static site. Part 1: Creating a GitHub Pages Repo Part 2: Setting Up Hugo Locally The following section covers getting your static site on your local machine.
